meanings.definition: Resembling a hair in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: The spider's web was made of delicate, hairlike strands.
meanings.sent2: The plant had tiny, hairlike structures on its leaves.
meanings.sent3: The hairlike threads on the fabric tickled my nose when I wore the sweater.
meanings.sent4: The dancer's movements were as graceful and hairlike as a flowing river.
meanings.sent5: The artist meticulously painted each hairlike detail on the canvas.
